DataElement.preferredName: Positive Surgical Margin Sum Length Millimeter Measurement
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The summed length of the positive margin at the edge of a surgically excised specimen.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Indicates the presence of tumor cells at the edge of a surgically excised specimen._The final aggregate amount._The linear extent in space from one end of something to the other end, or the extent of something from beginning to end.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Indicates the presence of tumor cells at the edge of a surgically excised specimen

Concepts.definition: Indicates the presence of tumor cells at the edge of a surgically excised specimen.

Property.preferredDefinition: The final aggregate amount.:The linear extent in space from one end of something to the other end, or the extent of something from beginning to end.

Concepts.definition: The linear extent in space from one end of something to the other end, or the extent of something from beginning to end.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: any measurements of a patient's surgical margins.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A metric unit of length equal to one thousandth of a meter (10E-3 meter) or approximately 0.03937 inch._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.
